title: How to Get the Superflat Terrain in Minecraft

steps.title: At the options page, click "More World Options".
steps.content: At the options page, click "More World Options". You will see, under the label of terrain, the word "default".

steps.title: Click "default" and set your terrain to Superflat.
steps.content: Click "default" and set your terrain to Superflat.

steps.title: Click "Done" and then click "Create".
steps.content: Click "Done" and then click "Create". Your superflat terrain will be created. Have fun! You can try the game before buying it. [1] X Research source Minecraft free trials are available to PC and Xbox users but not to mac users. [2] X Research source You can even download a Minecraft demo version. [3] X Research source
